item.title: management.py
item.description: Premise I was looking at this pastebin clone when I wanted to know what management.py was. Source code GitHub - HongyiFu/django-pastebin-clone: A pastebin clone done in Python with Django framework (no frontend) Searching for management.py Tools used LSP emacs google stackoverflow 1 v +/"Encapsulate the logic of the django-admin and manage.py utilities." "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/django/core/management/__init__.py" These are handed off to a ManagementUtility instance, which has a .
